topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ec3e79636872411d6f0000#post_53ec3e79636872411d6f0000
[bq="Albus Fahrenheits"]Anyone here got any memorable scars?[/bq]
I have a scar on my chest.
I was five years old and I was playing tag with my cousins. I tripped on a rock and fell on one of these things.
!https://www.agriculturesolutions.com/images/stories/virtuemart/product/Dewitt_Hard_Plas_4f45130068594.jpg!
It punched right through my chest and ended up two centimeters away from my heart. I don't remember much. I'm assuming I passed out from either blood loss or pain, but the next thing I remember was waking up in a hospital with a doctor dripping water in my chest. Unfortunately the scar tissue is now covered with chest hair...
